name: WISH (itch) (fishgloom)
description:
This is WISH, my first game that I made for an assignment. In it, you are someone who is looking for a creature said to grant anyone who finds it a single wish. But the strange person guarding the door to its lair says you have some old and oddly familiar things to find first...

To play, unzip the file. Use arrow keys to move. Use J to Start and Interact.

There is an occasional glitch in which the player will sometimes spawn into the black part of the maze instead of the white part. Restarting the game fixes it.

This is version 1.0. It was created in GB Studio.

Thank you for playing.
